songs.title: Ode to Joy
songs.description: Beethoven's iconic melody arranged for 4-channel NES chiptune with full harmony and percussion

songs.title: Für Elise
songs.description: Beethoven's delicate piano piece reimagined with pulse waves and arpeggiated accompaniment

songs.title: Greensleeves
songs.description: Medieval English folk song with pulse25 lead and waltz-like bass patterns

songs.title: Canon in D
songs.description: Pachelbel's famous canon with layered entry of voices over the iconic bass progression

songs.title: Megabyte Menace
songs.description: Intense D minor boss battle theme with fast arpeggios, chromatic tension, and driving percussion

songs.title: Midnight Rain
songs.description: Moody lo-fi chiptune in C minor with lowpass-filtered instruments and sparse rain textures

songs.title: Crystal Caves
songs.description: Dreamy ambient piece with sine pads, crystalline arpeggios, and water drip effects

songs.title: Neon Highway
songs.description: Driving synthwave-influenced track with detuned sawtooth leads and four-on-the-floor beats

songs.title: Glitch Dimension
songs.description: 3-minute experimental epic — sparse glitch intro builds through tritone grooves into an ambient cathedral breakdown, erupts in a Beautiful Accident climax with screaming diminished arpeggios, then dissolves into digital fragments

songs.title: Ocarina Echoes
songs.description: Adventure-game inspired forest theme with flute-like lead, rain bridge, and looping overworld energy

songs.title: Cathedral Vigil
songs.description: Long-form gothic cathedral background loop with organ reeds, bell mixtures, and slow procession motifs

songs.title: Requiem in Stone
songs.description: Through-composed gothic tone poem in E Phrygian — solo Bach counterpoint dissolves into Debussy parallel harmonies, erupts into a Beethoven rhythmic storm, then fades to silence with a Picardy third

songs.title: Sonata in C (Dissolving)
songs.description: Classical Mozart sonata that gradually dissolves — pristine Alberti bass and period phrases melt into whole-tone scales, chromatic chaos, and ghostly detuned fragments

songs.title: Tavern Brawl Crescendo
songs.description: Dignified tavern waltz escalates into full bar-fight chaos with chromatic mayhem, then settles into a sheepish off-key reprise

songs.title: Abyssal Waltz
songs.description: Submarine sonar pings evolve into a melancholy deep-sea waltz with bioluminescent arpeggios and whale-like bass

songs.title: Recursive Disagreement
songs.description: Two AI voices argue in counterpoint — polite call-and-response escalates to chromatic shouting, brief unison agreement, then immediate relapse into chaos

songs.title: Graceful Defeat
songs.description: Bittersweet victory fanfare for losing gracefully — Mixolydian/Dorian brass march with a brief flash of what triumph would have felt like

songs.title: Caravan of the Sirocco
songs.description: Desert caravan in E Phrygian with Andalusian cadences and oud ornaments — a sandstorm engulfs the melody before the theme emerges triumphant

songs.title: Speedrun Any%
songs.description: An entire RPG compressed into one track — title screen, town, overworld, dungeon, boss battle, victory, and credits connected by one transforming 4-note motif

songs.title: Orbital Lounge
songs.description: Smoky jazz club floating in orbit — walking bass, ii-V-I progressions, and whole-tone weightless passages fade to an intimate 2am set

songs.title: Cradle of the Colossus
songs.description: A gentle music-box lullaby that secretly contains an aggressive boss theme in augmentation — the true nature briefly reveals itself before settling back to sleep

songs.title: Save Corrupted (Recovering...)
songs.description: A corrupted save file slowly repairs itself — chaotic data fragments gradually reassemble into a beautiful melody before glitches creep back and the file cuts off

songs.title: Bonus Stage Bounce
songs.description: Bouncy 8-bit bonus stage theme with a funky E minor groove, syncopated bass, and a suspiciously familiar melody woven throughout

songs.title: White Pony ROM
songs.description: Deftones-inspired 8-bit shoegaze — ethereal sine vocals drift over detuned sawtooth guitar walls and heavy triangle bass in Bb minor, with quiet-loud-quiet dynamics and a dreamy underwater bridge

songs.title: Last Transmission from Voyager
songs.description: A space probe's final signal home — D major warmth fades through golden record melodies into deep-space silence as the transmitter weakens and data corrupts

songs.title: Elevator to the Final Floor
songs.description: Muzak elevator ride that grows increasingly unhinged floor by floor — pleasant C major bossa nova warps through jazz fusion, atonal chaos, and a heavenly pentatonic arrival

songs.title: Fencing Match in a Thunderstorm
songs.description: Two fencers duel in D minor as thunder crashes around them — staccato call-and-response builds through chromatic bouts to furious counterpoint, with lightning arpeggios and a key-change reprise

songs.title: The Coin's Journey
songs.description: Follow a coin through the economy — cheerful mint fanfare, pocket jingles, vending machine mechanics, street busker jazz, and a wishing-well descent into shimmering stillness

songs.title: Photosynthesis
songs.description: The inner life of a plant from seed to bloom — E minor roots push through soil into warm sunlight, chloroplasts pulse in Lydian mode, and a Picardy third marks full flower

songs.title: Dialectic of the Ramen
songs.description: A philosophical bowl of ramen in Bb major jazz — broth simmers in walking bass, noodle counterpoint tangles and untangles, and the final slurp resolves in a satisfying plagal cadence

songs.title: Long December
songs.description: Counting Crows cover in Eb major — melancholy piano-like arpeggios and gentle pulse-wave vocals build through verses and choruses with a hopeful modulation at the bridge

songs.title: The Password Was Wrong
songs.description: Escalating frustration of failed login attempts — cheerful G major typing devolves through error buzzes, frantic key-mashing, CAPTCHA puzzles, and a triumphant password-reset resolution

songs.title: Ghosts of the Arcade
songs.description: An abandoned arcade at midnight in A minor — coin-slot echoes awaken ghostly game themes that layer and overlap, building to a spectral crescendo before the power cuts out

songs.title: Kitchen Timer Fugue
songs.description: A proper Bach-style fugue in D minor triggered by a kitchen timer — subject enters voice by voice, develops through episodes and stretto, with a ticking clock ostinato throughout

songs.title: Monastery of the Morning Mist
songs.description: A Japanese mountain monastery at dawn — shakuhachi flute calls echo through fog, temple bells awaken, monks chant as mist burns away to reveal a breathtaking valley panorama

songs.title: Bazaar of the Midnight Sun
songs.description: A Nordic market under the endless summer sun — fiddle melodies weave through merchant calls, an aurora borealis appears with Lydian shimmer, and the bazaar winds down as the sun finally dips

songs.title: Voyage of the Paper Lantern
songs.description: A paper lantern drifts downriver at twilight — through bamboo groves, over rapids, past a waterfall plunge into stillness, through night market reflections, and out to a moonlit sea

songs.title: Oasis of the Forgotten King
songs.description: A traveler discovers ruins beneath an oasis — spectral court music plays in ghostly throne rooms, the forgotten king's lament echoes in B Phrygian, and the melody follows the traveler home

songs.title: Tidepool at the Edge of the World
songs.description: Celtic coastal exploration in G Mixolydian — tidepools reveal tiny worlds, a sea shanty rises from the wind in bold call-and-response, and the explorer gazes out where the world drops away

songs.title: Cyber-Cathedral Requiem
songs.description: Futuristic gothic cathedral service in D minor — traditional pipe organ counterpoint meets deep triangle pedals, ethereal detuned glitch choirs, and crystalline digital bells

songs.title: Neon Velocity
songs.description: High-octane cyberpunk chase theme at 175 BPM — driving triangle bass, syncopated pulse-wave leads, and dense noise-channel percussion for a futuristic urban pursuit

songs.title: Romantic Dissonance
songs.description: Classical meets Deftones — Bach-style counterpoint in C# minor dissolves into heavy shoegaze walls of sound, featuring detuned sawtooth textures and driving percussion

songs.title: Classical Runner Overture
songs.description: Three-minute hybrid of classical counterpoint and Bit.Trip Runner-style momentum: driving update-noise ticks, tight pulse harmonies, and a rushing A minor lead that blooms into a grand cadential finish

songs.title: Through the Fire and Flames
songs.description: 5-minute original power metal epic composed by 10 sequential Haiku agents — keyboard inferno intro builds to twin guitar assault, soaring chorus, shred solo, acoustic breakdown, and a blazing finale with 130 patterns and 6,918 events

songs.title: Survivors: Enchanted Forest
songs.description: Looping forest arena theme in D Dorian with pentatonic flute melodies, earthy triangle bass, and gentle woodland percussion at 100 BPM

songs.title: Survivors: Gothic Cathedral
songs.description: Looping gothic arena theme in E Phrygian with pipe organ harmonies, dark harmonic minor melodies, and processional percussion at 90 BPM

songs.title: Survivors: Cosmic Void
songs.description: Looping cosmic arena theme in F# Lydian with ethereal sine pads, whole-tone melodic passages, and weightless percussion at 110 BPM

songs.title: Survivors: Neon District
songs.description: Looping cyberpunk arena theme in A minor with detuned sawtooth leads, rapid pulse arpeggios, and driving four-on-the-floor beats at 128 BPM

songs.title: Survivors: Campfire Rest
songs.description: Relaxing town hub theme in C major with gentle triangle melody, soft pulse arpeggios, and minimal percussion for the campfire scene at 84 BPM
